title: Did Clifford Walker say at the KKK convention in 1924 that he would build a "wall of steel " against immigrants?
subtitle: A presidential curriculum vitae-writer compared with the then Government of Georgia. Walker's comments and the construction of the border iron wall that President Trump wants.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Georgia Goof. At the 1924 meeting of Ko Klux Klan, Clifford Walker said that he would "build a steel wall" against immigrants.
